abilities.description: The user can create a door in the air itself, leading into a pocket dimension that exists within the atmosphere.
The user can create a door on almost any solid surface, allowing passage through no matter how thick or strong the object is.

keyMoments.title: Blueno Demonstrates Doa Doa no Mi Powers
keyMoments.description: Blueno uses his Door-Door Fruit abilities extensively in combat, creating doors in the air and through solid objects to separate Robin from Sanji and Sogeking.
keyMoments.significance: First major combat demonstration of the Doa Doa no Mi's tactical versatility.

reveals.information: The Doa Doa no Mi can create doors in the air itself, leading to a pocket dimension
Doors can be created on any solid surface for passage through objects

abilities.description: The user can make copies of their body parts bloom on any surface, including on other people. In this episode, Robin uses this to restrain Blueno.

keyMoments.title: Robin Restrains Blueno
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her Hana Hana no Mi powers to restrain Blueno, preventing him from attacking Sanji and Sogeking further.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin using her powers to protect her crewmates even while surrendering herself.
